title: Providence Hockey Type ID.
content:
Hello,

Long time reader, first time poster.

I am trying to match a typeface and I am pretty sure it is a custom type.  
 [http://www.flickr.com/photos/31916775@N06/2983570281/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130215050435/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/31916775@N06/2983570281/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/31916775@N06/2983570281/")

It is a Providence College hockey jersey. I want to write something in the same type but with different letters. I will in know way be reflecting anything poorly upon the school or taking money by knocking off trademarks.

If anyone can suggest what type it is, similar to, or a good way to replicate it I would be so thankful.

Thanks  
Chris
author: cmitch5

comments.content:
My suggestion if to customize [Solano Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130215050435/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mvbfonts/solano-gothic/). [FB Agency Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20130215050435/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/fb-agency/) is also somewhat similar, take your choice.

- Mike Yanega

Hi Chris,

you could try [Agency Bold Compressed](http://web.archive.org/web/20130215050435/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/AgencyFB/styles). Or [ITC Machine](http://web.archive.org/web/20130215050435/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/itc_machine_medium/?sample_text=PROVIDENCE), maybe.  
F

Thank you very much Mike and Florian.

I think that I am going to go with MVB Solano Gothic Bold Cap. I think some minor crafting will bring a pretty close match. Thanks again for the help.

Chris
